de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice

Class Endpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice.Endpoint

  • @Path(value="/")
public class Endpoint
extends Object
    Provides SPARQL endpoint via [host]:[port]/r43ples/. Supplies version information, service description as well as SPARQL queries.
    Author:
    Stephan Hensel, Markus Graube

      • getRevisionGraph

        @Path(value="revisiongraph")
@GET
@Produces(value={"text/turtle","application/rdf+xml","application/json","text/html","application/svg+xml"})
public final Object getRevisionGraph(@HeaderParam(value="Accept")
                                        String format_header,
                                        @QueryParam(value="format")
                                        String format_query,
                                        @QueryParam(value="graph")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                        String graph)
        Provide revision information about R43ples system.
        Parameters:
        graph - Provide only information about this graph (if not null)
        Returns:
        RDF model of revision information

      • sparqlPOST

        @Path(value="sparql")
@POST
@Produces(value={"text/plain","text/html","application/json","application/rdf+xml","text/turtle","application/sparql-results+xml"})
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparqlPOST(@HeaderParam(value="Accept")
                                                      String formatHeader,
                                                      @FormParam(value="format")
                                                      String formatQuery,
                                                      @FormParam(value="query")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                      String sparqlQuery,
                                                      @FormParam(value="join_option")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                      String join_option)
                                           throws InternalErrorException
        HTTP POST interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE).
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        formatQuery - format specified in the HTTP parameters
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • sparqlGET

        @Path(value="sparql")
@GET
@Produces(value={"text/plain","text/html","application/json","application/rdf+xml","text/turtle","application/sparql-results+xml"})
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparqlGET(@HeaderParam(value="Accept")
                                                    String formatHeader,
                                                    @QueryParam(value="format")
                                                    String formatQuery,
                                                    @QueryParam(value="query")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                    String sparqlQuery,
                                                    @QueryParam(value="join_option")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                    boolean join_option)
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        HTTP GET interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE). Provides HTML form if no query is specified and HTML is requested Provides Service Description if no query is specified and RDF representation is requested
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        formatQuery - format specified in the HTTP parameters
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
